experience.Description: I was hired by :Part as a Youth Consultant and was tasked with finding solutions to a problem presented by Stockholm Exergi. The issue presented was that too few people were choosing to pursue an education in the electrical industry.
The tasks I performed included installing various devices innetwork/TV systems, communicating with customers via phone/email, and working with installation and deployment on-site.
